dialogue.htmlContent: You decide against ringing the bell on [vanessa.namePos] desk, and, taking one last look at the huge archive, you turn back and head out into the corridor.

At the far end of the corridor, there's an open door which bears a brass nameplate, reading: 'Bureau of Demographics'. A sign fixed to the adjacent wall offers some more information about the responsibilities this office has, and you read:

Bureau of Demographics
Manager: Ms. Cunningham

Public services provided:
- Official name changes
- Issuing of offspring tracking maps

Internal services:
- Population statistics
- Citizen cataloguing

Please note: If the door is closed, then we are currently busy.
Please wait in the corridor for us to conclude our business.
Repeated knocking will result in security being called.


As the door has been left wide open, you decide to enter the 'Bureau of Demographics', and so find yourself stepping into a large, high-ceilinged office, which appears to be completely vacant. A mahogany desk and dark leather chair sits in the middle of the room, while numerous filing cabinets and over-filled bookcases cover three of the walls. The fourth one, to your left, is entirely open, and you look across to see that this office adjoins a colossal archive. Row after row of ceiling-height shelving, each one filled with alphabetically and chronologically-ordered papers, stretch off into the vast space, and you can't help but wonder how many records are stored here.

Turning your attention back to the desk, you see that there's a brass nameplate sitting atop its surface, which mirrors the second line of the sign outside, reading: 'Manager: Ms. [vanessa.nameFull(true)]'. Beside this nameplate, there's a silver call bell, along with a sign instructing visitors to ring the bell if she isn't present. It also says that only one person can be seen at a time, and to please only use the bell if you are alone.

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_vanessaIntroduced))

[vanessa.Name] must be cataloguing records in the archive, so if you wanted to get her attention, you could do as the sign says and ring the bell, or simply turn around and leave.

#ELSE

Whoever this 'Ms. Cunningham' is, she must be busy in the archive. You could try ringing the bell on the desk to summon her, or simply turn around and leave.

#ENDIF

#IF(pc.hasCompanions())

As the sign asks for visitors to be alone, you tell [npc.name] to wait outside. Doing as you say, [npc.she] steps out into the corridor, closing the door behind [npc.herHim].

#ENDIF #IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_vanessaFucked))

Stepping up to the desk, you ring the bell, and after about ten seconds or so, the familiar figure of [vanessa.name] appears from behind one of the archive's shelves. In contrast to the first time you met her, you notice that there's a jovial spring to her step, and her bright blue eyes light up in delight as she sees that it's you who's come to visit her. [vanessa.speech([pc.Name]! It's wonderful to see you again!)]

#IF(vanessa.isVisiblyPregnant())

#IF(!vanessa.isCharacterReactedToPregnancy(pc)) As you start to return [vanessa.namePos] greeting, you suddenly notice that her blouse is visibly stretched out around her [style.colourSex(pregnant belly)]. Noticing your gaze flicking down to her midriff, the elderly fox-girl lets out a soft laugh and playfully asks, [vanessa.speech(This is what you wanted, right? ~Mmm!~ What a naughty [pc.girl] you are, giving me that pill and then finishing inside of me...)] #ELSE As you start to return [vanessa.namePos] greeting, you suddenly notice that her blouse is still visibly stretched out around her [style.colourSex(pregnant belly)]. Noticing your gaze flicking down to her midriff, the elderly fox-girl lets out a soft laugh and playfully states, [vanessa.speech(That's right, I'm still pregnant, thanks to you! ~Mmm!~ What a naughty [pc.girl] you were, giving me that pill and then finishing inside of me...)] #ENDIF

As she talks, [vanessa.name] steps up in front of you, and after taking hold of your [pc.hands], gets you to stroke her swollen belly. Seductively biting her lip, she teases, [vanessa.speech(Even with all this extra weight, I'm still having to be up and about on my feet all day... Surely I deserve another of those special massages of yours? If you're a good [pc.girl], I'll let you give me another creampie afterwards...)]

#ELSE

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_vanessaDailyMassage)) After the intimate affair the two of you had in this very office, you've obviously left quite a lasting impression upon the elderly fox-girl, and instead of striding over and collapsing down into her chair, she rushes up to stand close in front of you, before smiling happily at you and exclaiming, [vanessa.speech(Thanks for that massage you gave me earlier! My feet feel so much better now!)] #ELSE After the intimate affair the two of you had in this very office, you've obviously left quite a lasting impression upon the elderly fox-girl, and instead of striding over and collapsing down into her chair, she rushes up to stand close in front of you, before seductively biting her lip and teasing, [vanessa.speech(You know, I'm still having to be up and about on my feet all day... I couldn't persuade you to give me another of those special massages of yours, could I?)] #ENDIF

#ENDIF #ELSEIF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_vanessaIntroduced))

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_vanessaDailyMassage)) Stepping up to the desk, you ring the bell, and after about thirty seconds or so, the familiar figure of [vanessa.name] appears from behind one of the archive's shelves. Walking confidently over to her desk, she smiles happily at you as she sits down, before peering at you over the top of her half-moon glasses and saying, [vanessa.speech(Hello again, [pc.name]. Thank you again for that massage you gave me earlier; my feet are feeling so much better! Now, what can I do for you this time?)] #ELSEIF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_vanessaMassaged)) Stepping up to the desk, you ring the bell, and after about thirty seconds or so, the familiar figure of [vanessa.name] appears from behind one of the archive's shelves. Walking confidently over to her desk, she smiles happily at you as she sits down, before peering at you over the top of her half-moon glasses and saying, [vanessa.speech(Hello again, [pc.name]. Thank you again for that massage you gave me the other day; my feet are feeling so much better! Now, what can I do for you this time?)] #ELSE Stepping up to the desk, you ring the bell, and after about thirty seconds or so, the familiar figure of [vanessa.name] appears from behind one of the archive's shelves. Walking confidently over to her desk, she collapses down into her chair with a sigh, before peering at you over the top of her half-moon glasses and asking, [vanessa.speech(Hello again, what can I do for you this time?)] #ENDIF

#ELSE

Stepping up to the desk, you ring the bell, and after about thirty seconds or so, a womanly figure, dressed in smart office attire, appears from behind one of the archive's shelves. Looking over at who must be 'Ms. Cunningham', the first thing you notice is that, with the exception of a fox's tail and a pair of fox ears on top of her head, she appears to be entirely human. As she confidently walks over to her desk, you note that she appears to be in her mid-fifties, and that both the fur covering her fox parts, as well as her long, braided hair, have turned grey with age. Despite the fact that she's showing this clear sign of getting on in years, she's otherwise aged remarkably well, and while she doesn't possess the same youthful good-looks of someone half her age, she nevertheless has a refined, elegant beauty about her.

Although it doesn't seem to have had a detrimental effect on her looks, her age does appear to be taking a toll on her in a couple of other ways. First of all, there's the fact that she's wearing a pair of half-moon reading glasses, letting you know that her eyesight is compromised. Furthermore, as confidently as she tries to carry herself, you can't help but notice that there's a slight air of lethargy about her, and as she steps up to her desk, she half-sits, half-collapses down into her chair.

Letting out a weary sigh, the elderly fox-girl peers at you over the top of her glasses and says, [vanessa.speech(Good #IF(game.isMorning())morning#ELSEafternoon#ENDIF, my name is Ms. Cunningham, and I am both the manager and sole employee of the Bureau of Demographics. I don't wish to seem rude, but I have a considerable amount of cataloguing work to get done by the end of today, so if you could keep your business sharp and to the point, it would be much appreciated. As the sign outside should have told you, I am able to handle the procedure of getting your name changed, and can also issue you with an offspring tracking map, provided that you can afford the significant fee. So, what will it be, [pc.mister]...?)]

#IF(pc.getSurname().isEmpty()) [pc.speech(It's [pc.name],)] you introduce yourself to [vanessa.name], before moving on to the business at hand... #ELSE [pc.speech([pc.Surname]. [pc.Name] [pc.Surname],)] you introduce yourself to [vanessa.name], before moving on to the business at hand... #ENDIF

#ENDIF

[pc.speech(What are you cataloguing? And what's this huge archive used for?)] you ask, curious to hear what it is that [vanessa.name] gets up to in here.

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_vanessaFucked)) Letting out a mildly frustrated huff as she hears that you're not offering her a massage, [vanessa.name] nevertheless replies, #ELSE Letting out a mildly frustrated huff as she hears that you're not getting straight down to business, [vanessa.name] nevertheless replies, #ENDIF #IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_vanessaAskedAboutCatalogue)) [vanessa.speech(Well, as I've already told you once before, everybody has a unique signature to their arcane aura, much in the same way that everyone has a unique fingerprint. One of the larger rooms in the upper floor of this building houses an arcane device which can identify any unique arcane signature within all of the realm of Dominion. As soon as a new signature is detected, the relevant technical information is written down and sent to this department in order to be catalogued for future reference.)] #ELSE [vanessa.speech(Well, as you may or may not know, everybody has a unique signature to their arcane aura, much in the same way that everyone has a unique fingerprint. One of the larger rooms in the upper floor of this building houses an arcane device which can identify any unique arcane signature within all of the realm of Dominion. As soon as a new signature is detected, the relevant technical information is written down and sent to this department in order to be catalogued for future reference.)] #ENDIF

[pc.speech(So it's a record of everyone who lives, or has ever lived, in Dominion?)] you ask.

[vanessa.speech(Correct. Although it's a far more complicated procedure, the same apparatus can be used to track the rough location of people. I'm no expert, but I believe that this is the same sort of method that's used to track those who are wanted for enslavement by the Enforcers. Once an arcane signature has been entered into their tracking system, there's no way for the criminal to remove their designation for enslavement.)] [vanessa.name] explains, before concluding, [vanessa.speech(We here at city hall have access to a more limited version of this tracking system, and this very department is licensed to use it in order to create offspring tracking maps.)]

With your question now answered, you wonder what to do next...

[pc.speech(Why are you the only one working here?)] you ask, wondering why such a huge department only has a single employee assigned to its management.

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_vanessaFucked)) Pouting at you as she hears that you're not offering her a massage, [vanessa.name] nevertheless replies, #ELSE Impatiently tapping her fingers on her desk as she hears that you're not getting straight down to business, [vanessa.name] nevertheless replies, #ENDIF #IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_vanessaAskedAboutSolitary)) [vanessa.speech(I already told you this... There's very little demand for name changes or offspring tracking maps, so this department is considered to only need enough staff to cover cataloguing work. As a result, the higher-ups have determined that it only takes one person to do everything in here. I do manage to get all of my work done on time, so I suppose they're right, but it does get a little lonely...)] #ELSE [vanessa.speech(Well, there's very little demand for name changes or offspring tracking maps, so this department is considered to only need enough staff to cover cataloguing work. As a result, the higher-ups have determined that it only takes one person to do everything in here. I do manage to get all of my work done on time, so I suppose that they're right, but it does get a little lonely...)] #ENDIF

With your question now answered, you wonder what to do next...

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_vanessaFucked))

Looking across to the archive's shelves, you see quite a large number of boxes piled up that are marked 'For sorting', and you realise that [vanessa.name] is once again struggling to keep on top of her work. Although she appears to have a lot more energy and enthusiasm since the two of you had sex, you imagine that the elderly fox-girl would still appreciate an offer of help. Smiling fondly at her, you ask, [pc.speech(Would you like some help with your cataloguing work again? I have some time to spare.)]

[vanessa.speech(Without filing the assistance forms?)] [vanessa.name] teases, blushing at the thought of accepting help without following the proper procedure. [vanessa.speech(I suppose we could be naughty and do it together again...)]

Having obtained [vanessa.namePos] consent, you start walking over towards the boxes. As you do so, the fox-girl quickly follows in your footsteps, and as you come to a halt, she leans in against your back and sighs, [vanessa.speech(Perhaps after we're finished, we could do something else that's very naughty together...)]

Stepping around in front of you, [vanessa.name] picks up the top box, before telling you to grab one and follow her into the archives. Doing as you're told, you grab the box and follow [vanessa.namePos] lead as she heads into the maze-like shelving of the archives. Soon arriving at your destination, the fox-girl turns towards you and says, [vanessa.speech(The papers within the box are already sorted alphabetically, so all you need to do is to slot them into the shelves in the correct order. Let's get to it.)]

As you each set about filing the papers in your respective boxes, [vanessa.name] smirks and remarks, [vanessa.speech(Getting help without submitting the proper forms... This is so naughty!)]

#ELSE

From both the way [vanessa.name] collapsed down into her chair, as well as the weary look on her face, you can tell that her work is taking a toll on her health. Looking across to the archive's shelves, you see quite a large number of boxes piled up that are marked 'For sorting', and you realise that [vanessa.name] has a significant amount of work still to do. Not wanting to leave the elderly fox-girl to deal with it all by herself, you ask, [pc.speech(Would you like some help with your cataloguing work? I have some time to spare.)]

[vanessa.speech(You want to help?)] [vanessa.name] asks, surprised at your sudden offer, [vanessa.speech(But you haven't even filed the 'application for unpaid assistance' form 22-F, have you? And that's not to mention the liability waiver forms that need to be submitted and approved. I... I can't accept your help without those...)]

Although she's sticking to regulations, you can tell that [vanessa.name] really does want some help, and so you press her, [pc.speech(You're the only one in here; nobody's going to know if I've helped you out or not. Do you want me to help?)]

[vanessa.speech(Well, yes, but-)] [vanessa.name] replies, but she cuts her sentence short as you turn and start walking over towards the boxes. [vanessa.speech(Wait! You can't enter that area without filing form 41-A!)]

Ignoring [vanessa.namePos] objection, you walk over to the boxes and ask, [pc.speech(So what do I need to do with these?)]

Walking over to you, [vanessa.name] lets out an exasperated sigh, before answering, [vanessa.speech(Just take that top box and follow me around here.)]

Doing as you're told, you grab the box and follow in [vanessa.namePos] footsteps as she leads you into the maze-like shelving of the archives. Soon arriving at your destination, the fox-girl turns towards you and says, [vanessa.speech(The papers within the box are already sorted alphabetically, so all you need to do is to slot them into the shelves in the correct order. I'll be back in a moment.)]

With that, [vanessa.name] hurries off to fetch a box of her own, and within a couple of minutes, she returns and places it down next to yours. Although initially distressed at the thought of the two of you being caught, [vanessa.name] soon starts to relax, and as you each set about filing the papers in your respective boxes, she smirks and remarks, [vanessa.speech(Getting help without submitting the proper forms... This is so naughty! Seeing as we're breaking regulations as it is, you can call me by my first name... It's Vanessa...)]

#ENDIF

[pc.speech(I'd feel more comfortable continuing to call you 'Ms. Cunningham',)] you reply, smiling at the elderly fox-girl to let her know that you aren't trying to be rude.

[vanessa.speech(Oh, well that's fine too,)] [vanessa.name] says, [vanessa.speech(but if you change your mind, feel free to call me Vanessa at any time!)]
[pc.speech(Sure thing, Vanessa,)] you reply, smiling at the elderly fox-girl to let her know that you're more than happy to be on such familiar terms with her.

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_vanessaFucked))

The two of you spend the next couple of hours cataloguing papers, making small talk, and flirting with one another. [vanessa.NamePos] department is just as quiet as the last time you were here, and for the whole period during which the two of you are working, you're only interrupted by the ring of the front desk's bell once.

Before you know it, the two of you have worked you way through all of the boxes which needed to be sorted by the end of today. Heading back over to the front desk, [vanessa.name] collapses down onto her chair with a sigh, [vanessa.speech(Phew... Thank you for your help again, [pc.name]. You know, even with you doing over half of the work, #IF(game.isFootContentEnabled()) my feet #ELSE my shoulders #ENDIF are still killing me after that...)]

Leaning down to rub at the tops of her feet, [vanessa.name] looks up at you and flashes you a seductive smile. As the top couple of buttons of her shirt are undone, the fox-girl flashes you with a view straight down to her cleavage, and you find yourself with a clear view of not only her lacy black plunge bra, but also the tops of her [vanessa.breastSize], pale tits. Letting out a little laugh, she pushes out her chest and teases, [vanessa.speech(Did you think I flashed you by accident the first time you helped me? I just wanted to show off what you could get if you took some initiative... So, are you going to give me another of your massages again, or do I have to beg for it?)]

Smiling down at the horny fox-girl, you wonder if you should #IF(game.isFootContentEnabled()) drop down onto your knees and start massaging her feet, #ELSE [pc.step] around behind her and start massaging her shoulders, #ENDIF or perhaps you could do as she suggests and get her to beg for it...

#ELSE

The two of you spend the next couple of hours cataloguing papers and making small talk. [vanessa.NamePos] department turns out to be extremely quiet, and during the whole time that the two of you are working, you're only interrupted by the ring of the front desk's bell once.

Before you know it, the two of you have worked you way through all of the boxes which needed to be sorted by the end of today. Heading back over to the front desk, [vanessa.name] collapses down onto her chair with a sigh, [vanessa.speech(Phew... Thank you for your help, [pc.name]. You know, even with you doing over half of the work, #IF(game.isFootContentEnabled()) my feet #ELSE my shoulders #ENDIF are still killing me after that...)]

Leaning down to rub at the tops of her feet, [vanessa.name] looks up at you and smiles. As the top couple of buttons of her shirt are undone, the fox-girl inadvertently flashes you with a view straight down to her cleavage, and you find yourself with a clear view of not only her lacy black plunge bra, but also the tops of her [vanessa.breastSize], pale tits.

[pc.speech(You're welcome,)] you reply in response to her thanks, before wondering if you should take advantage of the fact that [vanessa.namePos] #IF(game.isFootContentEnabled()) feet are hurting to offer her a foot massage... #ELSE shoulders are hurting to offer her a massage... #ENDIF

#ENDIF

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_vanessaFucked))

[pc.speech(I'd love to give you another massage,)] you say, dropping to your knees in front of the horny fox-girl.

[vanessa.speech(Oh, yes, good [pc.girl],)] [vanessa.name] replies, smiling coyly as she swivels her chair to face you. Lifting her feet, she allows you to slip off her flats, and in just a moment, you find yourself presented with her pantyhose-covered feet once again. Wiggling her toes at you, she bites her lip and teases, [vanessa.speech(Go on then, let's get started.)]

#ELSEIF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_vanessaMassaged))

[pc.speech(Perhaps I can help get rid of the aches in your feet again?)] you ask.

[vanessa.speech(Oh, yes, that'd be delightful,)] [vanessa.name] replies, smiling coyly as she swivels her chair to face you. Lifting her feet, she lets out a delighted sigh as you drop to your knees and slip off her flats, gaining access to her pantyhose-covered feet once again. Wiggling her toes at you, she bites her lip and teases, [vanessa.speech(Go on then, show me what you can do.)]

#ELSE

[pc.speech(Perhaps I can help get rid of the aches in your feet as well?)] you ask, [pc.speech(How long's it been since you had a foot massage?)]

[vanessa.speech(Too long,)] [vanessa.name] replies, smiling coyly as she swivels her chair to face you. Lifting her feet, she lets out a delighted sigh as you drop to your knees and slip off her flats, gaining access to her pantyhose-covered feet. Wiggling her toes at you, she bites her lip and teases, [vanessa.speech(Go on then, show me what you can do.)]

#ENDIF

[pc.speech(Getting you to beg sounds like fun,)] you tease, smiling at the elderly fox-girl. [pc.speech(Go on, tell me how much you want it.)]

Playfully pouting at you, [vanessa.name] whines, [vanessa.speech(Please, [pc.name]! Your massages are the best! You wouldn't be mean to me and leave me with aching feet, would you?)]

[pc.speech(I suppose not,)] you reply, dropping to your knees in front of her.

Seeing that you're going to give her what she wants, [vanessa.name] lets out a delighted sigh as she holds up her feet, allowing you to slip off her flats and gain access to her pantyhose-covered feet once again. Wiggling her toes at you, she bites her lip and teases, [vanessa.speech(Go on then, let's get started.)]

#IF(pc.getArmRows()>1)

Taking hold of both of [vanessa.namePos] feet, you shuffle forwards and let them rest on your knees. As you have [pc.armRows] [pc.arms], you aren't bound by the same restrictions that an ordinary person is, and use your extra [pc.hands] in order to start massaging both of [vanessa.namePos] feet at once. Running your multiple [pc.hands] up the sides of both of her soles, you press your [pc.fingers] in and start applying a gentle pressure as you begin giving your massage in earnest.

As you run your [pc.hands] up and down over her feet, you can't help but think to yourself how slender and delicate they are. Careful not to press down too hard, you continue kneading and massaging [vanessa.namePos] feet, before working your way down and starting to rub at her toes.

[vanessa.speech(Aah... Yes...)] [vanessa.name] suddenly exhales in an incredibly erotic manner. Looking up at her, you see that she's allowed her eyes to close, and that the light skin of her cheeks is flushing scarlet. Moving your gaze down, you see her [vanessa.breastSize], [vanessa.cupSize]-cup breasts heavily heaving up and down, while her fingers are going white with how tightly she's gripping the arms of her chair.

Encouraged by this, and now certain that you're doing a good job, you move back to your starting position, and repeat the same rubbing, kneading motion up and down the sides of her soles. With [vanessa.namePos] sighs and heavy breathing filling the room, you continue massaging both of her feet at the same time, until eventually you've given them far more attention than you'd originally intended.

#ELSE

Taking hold of both of [vanessa.namePos] feet, you shuffle forwards and let them rest on your knees. Moving your touch over to her right foot, you run your [pc.hands] up the sides of her soles, pressing your [pc.fingers] in and applying a gentle pressure as you start giving her a massage.

As you run your [pc.hands] up and down over her foot, you can't help but think to yourself how slender and delicate it is. Careful not to press down too hard, you continue kneading and massaging [vanessa.namePos] foot, before working your way down and starting to rub at her toes.

[vanessa.speech(Aah... Yes...)] [vanessa.name] suddenly exhales in an incredibly erotic manner. Looking up at her, you see that she's allowed her eyes to close, and that the light skin of her cheeks is flushing scarlet. Moving your gaze down, you see her [vanessa.breastSize], [vanessa.cupSize]-cup breasts heavily heaving up and down, while her fingers are going white with how tightly she's gripping the arms of her chair.

Encouraged by this, and now certain that you're doing a good job, you move on to [vanessa.namePos] left foot, and repeat the same rubbing, kneading motion on that one. With [vanessa.namePos] sighs and heavy breathing filling the room, you continue massaging her feet, moving from one to the other until eventually both of them have had far more attention than you originally intended to give.

#ENDIF #IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_vanessaFucked))

Sensing that your massage is coming to an end, [vanessa.name] lets out a protesting whine, before opening her eyes and panting down at you, [vanessa.speech(Please, [pc.name], do it like you did before! Come on, pull my pantyhose off already!)]

As she says this, she lifts her hips in her chair, and, reaching under her skirt, hooks her fingers into the band of her pantyhose. You only have a moment in which to either tell her to stop, or to decide to help the obviously-horny fox-girl take off her pantyhose, in which case you'd end up giving her a bare foot massage again...

#ELSE

Sensing that your massage is coming to an end, [vanessa.name] lets out a protesting whine, before opening her eyes and panting down at you, [vanessa.speech(Please, [pc.name], don't stop just yet! You can go a little further if you want...)]

As she says this, she lifts her hips in her chair, and, reaching under her skirt, hooks her fingers into the band of her pantyhose. You only have a moment in which to either tell her to stop, or to decide to help the obviously-horny fox-girl take off her pantyhose, in which case you'd end up giving her a bare foot massage...

#ENDIF

Not wanting to go any further with [vanessa.name] right now, you shuffle back and say, [pc.speech(Sorry, [vanessa.name], but I don't have time for any more right now.)]

[vanessa.speech(Aww...)] [vanessa.name] whines as you slip her flats back onto her feet, pouting at you for a moment before giving you a happy smile. [vanessa.speech(Well, thanks for your help, and for the massage! If you wanted to go further, we can do it again tomorrow?)]

Giving the elderly fox-girl a non-committal response, you stand up and wonder what you should do now...

Wanting to take things further, you reach up and take hold of [vanessa.namePos] thighs, before gripping the fabric of her pantyhose and helping her to pull them down from around her hips. Letting out a delighted giggle, [vanessa.name] lets go of the stretchy nylon, allowing you to do the rest of the work in pulling her pantyhose all the way down over her knees and to her ankles. With one last tug, you pull them completely off, leaving her pale, slender feet fully exposed.

[vanessa.speech(Go on, keep going,)] [vanessa.name] pants, lifting her feet and pushing them against your [pc.hands].

#IF(pc.getArmRows()>1) Eager to oblige the fox-girl's request, you set about using your multiple pairs of hands to continue giving her a foot massage. This time, however, it feels very different from before, as instead of pressing down and rubbing against nylon, your touch is running over [vanessa.namePos] bare skin. #ELSE Eager to oblige the fox-girl's request, you set about starting your foot massage all over again, starting once more from her right foot. This time, however, it feels very different from before, as instead of pressing down and rubbing against nylon, your touch is running over [vanessa.namePos] bare skin. #ENDIF

As she continues to pant and sigh above you, you take note of the fact that the skin of [vanessa.namePos] feet starts to get hard at the lower sides, and is very tough and thick around the heels and balls of her feet. From the nature of her job, having to pace up and down the aisles of the archive all day, you aren't surprised to find that the soles of her feet are tough, but in contrast to this, you are somewhat taken aback by how soft the rest of her feet are. As you work your touch up and over the tops of them, you can't help but remark to yourself how silky-smooth her skin is.

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_vanessaFucked))

Just as you start wondering what secret [vanessa.name] has to having such healthy skin, she moans down from above, [vanessa.speech(Mmm, you know, this takes me back again... Back to that time I told you about before, when I was a very special friend to a beautiful bee-girl...)]

You look up at [vanessa.name] just in time to see her pulling up her skirt and spreading her legs. Doing as you're asked, you stand still as [vanessa.name] produces a curious device from her desk, before stepping over towards you and starting to wave it up and down over your body. Taking a closer look at the curious device, you see that it appears to be a long, transparent crystal, set into a sturdy metal wand. As the fox-girl proceeds with her task, the crystal starts to give off a deep pink-purple glow, and within just a few moments, the light that it's emitting has amplified enough so that the whole room is cast in a shade of deep magenta.

[vanessa.speech(I've never seen it glow like this before,)] [vanessa.name] mutters, clearly impressed by what's happening.

[pc.speech(It's nothing to worry about, is it?)] you ask, wondering if the device is going to be up-to-task.

[vanessa.speech(No, it's almost done,)] [vanessa.name] replies, and just as she says that, the crystal suddenly emits a flash of green light, before returning to the same dull transparency that it had to begin with. [vanessa.speech(Excellent, it's all fine. I'll get this sent up right away.)]

Sitting back down behind her desk, [vanessa.name] presses a button on what looks to be some sort of arcane intercom, before speaking into it, [vanessa.speech(Hello, Judy? I need someone to come and collect an arcane signature reading.)]

Almost instantly, a voice crackles into life through the arcane device, [genericFemale.speech(Understood, Ms. Cunningham. I'll be right down.)]

Sure enough, after about two minutes, a bright-eyed cat-girl enters the office, and after collecting both the crystal and the fifty-thousand flame fee, she rushes off to get your map made. Thankfully, both the process of creation and the accompanying admin work don't take too long, and after you and [vanessa.name] have spent fifteen or so minutes filling out the necessary paperwork, Judy returns.

[genericFemale.speech(Here you are, Ms. Cunningham,)] she says, placing the folded map down onto the desk before the elderly fox-girl, before quickly scurrying out of the room.

Sliding the map towards you, [vanessa.name] smiles and says, [vanessa.speech(There you are, [pc.name]. We've never had any complaints about this service, but if there's ever any problem with the map, please do come back and see me. I think we've just about wrapped up all the paperwork as well, so is there anything else you needed from me?)]

Taking the arcane map, you wonder if there's anything else you wanted to ask [vanessa.name]...

#IF(pc.getMoney()>=50000) You don't really want to purchase an offspring tracking map, and so you tell [vanessa.name] that you might get one another time. Peering at you over the top of her half-moon reading glasses, she asks, [vanessa.speech(Is there anything else I can do for you?)] #ELSE You don't have the funds required in order to purchase an offspring tracking map, and so you tell [vanessa.name] that you might get one another time. Peering at you over the top of her half-moon reading glasses, she asks, [vanessa.speech(Is there anything else I can do for you?)] #ENDIF

You wonder if you should ask her something else, or take your leave...

Wanting to know more about getting your name officially changed, you ask [vanessa.name] how you'd go about doing so.

[vanessa.speech(Well, there are several forms specifically related to changing your name which will need to be filled out, as well as a more generic set of A-series documents which need to be submitted alongside any official work,)] [vanessa.name] explains, [vanessa.speech(Due to regulations, only certified government employees are allowed to fill out these forms, and we are required to ask for a fee in exchange for providing this service. Would you like to get your name changed now? After you've paid the one-hundred flame fee, I can get these forms filled out for you in about ten minutes.)]

Producing several sheets of paper from one of her desk's drawers, the elderly fox-girl points to a line near the bottom of the top-most page, and says, [vanessa.speech(This section here allows you to specify whether or not you'd like all of your offspring to be re-registered with your new surname. The process of updating records in this manner is very time consuming, so there's a rather hefty fee of five-thousand flames for this service. Just let me know if your name change is just for you, or for all of your descendants.)]

Deciding against having your name changed, you thank [vanessa.name] for explaining the process to you, but that you want to think about it a little more first. Putting the documents back in her desk's drawer, she peers over the top of her half-moon reading glasses and asks, [vanessa.speech(What else can I do for you, then?)]

You wonder if you should ask her something else, or take your leave...
